summary: An ordinance amending section 1 of Ordinance No. 28385, entitled: "An ordinance granting to the Seattle Electric Company, its successors and assigns, the right to construct, maintain and operate a side track beginning at the intersection of Columbia Street and Western Avenue, making suitable connection with existing tracks of the Seattle Electric Company, on Western Avenue, thence along Columbia Street to 1st Avenue, making connection with existing tracks of the Seattle Electric Company on 1st Avenue" approved November 14, 1911, for the purpose of making certain regulations as to the carrying of freight.
